description:
Almost half of people surveyed across the European Union are in favour of banning fossil fuel advertising — nearly twice as many who oppose such a move, according to a new study. Climate campaigners are urging governments to impose tobacco-style restrictions on advertising for oil and gas companies and high-carbon goods and services such as flights, […]

The post Strong Support Among Europeans for Banning Fossil Fuel Ads, Study Finds appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Strong Support Among Europeans for Banning Fossil Fuel Ads, Study Finds
